title: I study well but I am always 2nd in class. What can I do to take the first place? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a student ,I have passed this situation many times in my school life.when i was in smaller standard i stood in top 5 of the class.This scenario going on upto standard 6 .At that time i also have been faced with question like yours”HOW CAN I BE THE FIRST IN THE CLASS?” . In standard 7,I commited myself “I have to prepare all subjects at my best level”.I have prepared good and other people are prepared at that time with their own capacity level.Result declared and i have ranked 1st in the class. so answer of your question is you have to check your capacity first then you can think about ranking. I have given your answer at level of class which is limited upto 60–70 students.Ranking is matter only in taking admissions in good university otherwise you ranked 1st or 2nd in standard upto 11th is doesn’t matter.If you work with your heart and put your soul in your work then you definately can achieve your goal,

Great that you askes this question. First of all let me tell you one thing which should be kept in your mind . Don't compete, it's really unnecessary to compete in class. Marks do mean a lot but being class 1st or 2nd doesn't mean anything to anyone. It's not a great achievement. What's a real achievement is getting into a well reputed company or university . The only advice I can provide to you is to study hard and smart. There are various option to study,choose anyone of then which enables you to understand the topics better. Don't by heart material as they can be easily forgotten. Instead understand the concept and study the important lines or words that can be used in your wrting. Write answers in clear yet distinctive tone. Improve your answering writing skill. Try to explain thing with little words. Because the people you corrects your answer sheet need not have the time to read the entire thing you have writen.
